meanings.definition: In a donnish manner; pedantically or pretentiously intellectual.
meanings.sent1: He spoke donnishly about the history of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: She always dresses donnishly in tweed jackets and glasses.
meanings.sent3: The donnishly dressed professor tripped over his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent4: Her donnishly precise handwriting could rival a typewriter.
meanings.sent5: The donnishly decorated study was filled with leather-bound books and antique globes.
